choices: At the accident (A month before the show starts)
1.content:
First-up some small descriptions of the main characters.

Danny Fenton/Phantom
Danny Fenton is a 14-year-old boy who after a lab accident in his parents' ghost hunting lab become,s a half-ghost called Danny Phantom, and obtains a variety of ghost powers. Despite not being very popular in school and a constant victim to bullies, he is steadfast and loyal to his friends and family.

Tucker Foley
Danny's best friend since forever they share virtually anything with each other, including their friendship. while having his faults in the end he just can't let Danny down. Tucker is nicknamed the 'Techno-Geek' by the popular kids for his impressive knowledge of computers and gadgetry. He is infatuated with technology, including his PDA, and cannot live without it,
Tucker is also constantly struggling to attract girls, but the all completely ignore him. Unfortunately, he does not know when to keep his mouth shut, which gets him into trouble. He only eats meat.

Sam Manson
Sam Manson is one of Danny's best friends. she is a goth much to the dismay of he parents and hardcore vegetarian she is extremely wealthy, but keeps this a secret. because according to her, she wants to earn real friends, rather than the popularity and fake friendships that come with wealth. Sam is often the most responsible of the tree but she does have the tendency to be bossy and a bit self righteous at times especially when environmental causes are involved.

The story will start in third person to make switching between characters easier.

Now where do we enter the show?
1.title: Where to start?

11.content: So where in season 1 shall we start ?
11.title: Season 1

Dash:Hey!

Danny yanks Dash's underwear up and over his head, and dumps the frogs into his pants. Dash's head tears through his underwear, and he cries out in pain as he hops down the hallway.

Dash : Wh-ow! Ow! O-ooh! (Repeatedly:) Ow! Ow! Ow! Ow! Ow!

Danny chuckles to himself. Cut to locker 724, which begins to glow green as Poindexter speaks from within once more.

Poindexter: Bullies! (Suddenly phases halfway out of the locker door.) Hey! I'm free! Finally, the doorway's been opened! (Notices Danny laughing.) You think that's funny, buster?

Danny: (Notices Poindexter floating next to him.) Huh? What? You can see me?

Poindexter: Yeah, that's right, bub. Now leave that poor kid alone.

Danny: (Turns fully visible.) What? Oh. (Laughs.) Oh, man. That's good. Man, do you ever have it backwards.

Poindexter: Don't hand me that jazz, Clyde. You're the bully from where I'm standing.

12422.content:
"You'll never be able to climb fast enough" shouted Skulker to the shrunken Danny Phantom and his high school jock bully, Dash Baxter, as they climbed a giant strand of cheese hanging from a pizza. As Danny reaches the top and escapes the ghost zone portal, he has used all his energy and begins to transform back into Danny Fenton.

"Hey where did you go?" asks Dash as Danny, with few options, hides under a desk. At that moment, Jack Fenton, Danny's father, barges into the lab at the sound of Dash's frantic cries for help. "Please change me back, Fenton" Dash pleads to the humongous form of Jack. Dash went inside the Fenton Crammer and was returned to full size by Jack.

While looking around the room for the ghost boy, Dash spots Danny hiding behind a leg under the desk. An evil grin emerges on his face. "Well, well Fenturd, I didn't know you got shrunk too." Dash's sweaty hand wraps around the minuscule form of Danny as he drops Danny into the pocket of his Letterman Jacket.

"Let me go Dash!" shouts Danny to his tormentor as Dash walks out of Danny's house. Dash smirks, "You and me are going to spend some quality time together, FENTURD!"
12422.title: Shrunk with the enemy

choices: Danny. However, he was twice Dash's height and the crammer seemed to have broke
Danny AND Dash. Dannys normal but Dash couldn't fit in his room and broke cramer
124221.content:
Despite his protests, Danny was taken to Dash's house. It's kind of strange that nobody seemed to have heard Danny's protests. Then again, the people of Amity Park were not THAT observant. Upon entering his room, Dash took Danny out of the pocket of his jacket and placed him in a glass cage. It would seem Dash used to have a reptile or something before.
"Hey Fenturd!" Dash said as he looked down at Danny. "I'm going to the bathroom, you better be there when I come back." He then left the room. From what Danny could gather, Dash still had stuffed animals, his powers were still on the frits and Dash's parents weren't home. Danny getting frustrated after spending two minutes in the cage noticed Dash's bag at the foot of the desk that the cage was on. It was the Fenton Crammer! Wondering how Dash could have gotten it, he then came to the conclusion that his dad must have placed it in Dash's bag instead of the desk at home. Danny was able to move the objects in the glassed environment he was in to make a platform to get out of the cage. He then jumped down on the bag and tried to angle the crammer. Thankfully, there was a timer so Danny could shoot him self. It was set to "uncram" and he got in front of it. However, there was a few sparks that came from the crammer. Could it be broken? It that wasn't worrying, Dash JUST entered the room as the crammer shot at...

131.content:
Here,s a small description of these episodes

Episode 41 Eye For An Eye
Danny and Vlad’s game of revenge starts off childish, but ends when Vlad runs for mayor of Amity Park and wins. Now Danny must survive the grueling rules the billionaire turned politician has placed.

Episode 42 Infinite Realms
While trying to map out the Ghost Zone, Danny, Sam and Tucker befriend a ghost named Frostbite who gives them a map that can take the user to anywhere in the Ghost Zone. However, Vlad manages to steal it, and it's up to Danny and friends to get it back.

Episode 43 Girls' Night Out
As revenge on men, Spectra, Kitty and Ember join forces and use their powers to make all males vanish from Amity Park. Sam, Jazz and Maddie must team up to undo the damage. Meanwhile, Danny and Jack deal with an unwelcome visit from Skulker during a father/son fishing trip.

Wat episode do you want to enter?
131.title: episode,s 41-43

132.content:
Here,s a small description of these episodes

Episode 44 Torrent of Terror
Looking to increase his popularity as Mayor of Amity Park, Vlad releases a weather ghost to bring rain during a drought who eventually rebels against him. A fight with Danny causes the ghost boy,s mood shifts to affect the very weather itself.

Episode 45 Forever Phantom
A ghost with morphing abilities impersonates Danny Fenton for attention, but both he and the actual Danny Phantom get locked in their forms by a Fenton Device, stuck in the cross-holds of fame and madness from the citizens of Amity Park and two angry Fenton parents out for Danny Phantom himself.

Episode 46 Urban Jungle
A plant ghost named Undergrowth turns Amity Park into a literal jungle, in the process holding the citizens captive and even worse, kidnapping and brainwashing the nature-loving Sam into being his "queen". Danny must save Amity Park all the while learning to control his new ice powers.

Wat episode do you want to enter?
132.title: episode,s 44-46

133.content:
Here,s a small description of these episodes

Episode 47 Living' Large
The Fentons sell Fentonworks to the Guys in White who plan to destroy the Ghost Zone with a missile, all the while as Danny starts to let the rich life get a hold of him and jeopardize his friendship with Sam and Tucker.

Episode 48 Boxed Up Fury
When the Box Ghost tries to prove that he's competent, he steals and opens Pandora's Box thereby releasing all the evil contained within it. Now it's up to Danny to seek out Pandora and put an end to the sudden wreaking havoc in Amity Park caused by the Box Ghost.

Episode 49 Frightmare
Danny wakes up to find the citizens of Amity Park under a deep sleep thanks to the ghost of dreams Nocturne, who is sucking up their dreams to increase his energy. Danny must wake his friends and sister in order to stop this threat.

Wat episode do you want to enter?
133.title: episodes 47-49

134.content:
Here,s a small description of these episodes

Episode 50 Claw of The Wild
Danny, Sam, Tucker, and their classmates go on a camping trip only to find that there are monsters lurking within the forest, kidnapping campers one by one, leaving Danny and Sam to investigate the matter by themselves and reunite with an old friend.

Episode 51 D-Stabilized
Danielle Phantom returns to Amity Park with a problem; she has trouble maintaining her ghost form. Meanwhile, Vlad sends Valerie (who's unaware that he's Vlad Plasmius) to capture Danielle so that he can use her DNA to make a better clone.

Episode 52/53 Phantom Planet
Vlad hires a new team--The Masters Blasters--to outdo Danny Phantom, and Danny retires from his duties and strips himself of his powers. But a hero is needed when a deadly asteroid is about to strike Earth and the Ghost Zone.
134.title: episodes 50-53

Sam and Tucker look concerned for their friend, but decide that since his parents ARE ghost hunters, he has the most experience with the equipment. Danny walks in with Sam and Tucker watching with anticipation. It was dark in the portal so Danny had to feel along the wall to find his way. Suddenly he felt a small bump on the wall and felt it move. As he saw a bright green light only two words went through his mind.

"Oh. No."

He tried to run, but it was too late.

"DANNY!" Sam cried. Tucker quickly went to the remote panel and activated the manual override. Sam and Tucker dragged Danny out of the Ghost Portal at their unconscious friend. choices: Tucker comes out of the kitchen
1421.content:
Sam walked forward Confidently till she was about halfway in looking around It brought a smile to her face knowing she had proved Tucker wrong. She cocked her head to the side as she noticed twin buttons on one side of the portal. As curiosity got the better of her Sam did not even attempt to resist the urge to press one of the buttons so she slowly reached forward to place her finger on the green one.

The next few seconds seemed to pass by in slow motion for. Just as Sam pushed the button in Danny noticed that the machine was still plugged in, He gave out a scream of warning that got both Tucker and Sam's Attention. Tucker turned his head to look at his friend while Sam released the button which only added to the situation.

Not even a second after she released the button, green ecto energy filled the portal, surging through her body. She let out a scream that rang through the house loud enough to shake the window paines. It felt as if her entire body was being turned inside-out then everything went black.
Danny and Tucker rushed to her aid only to be stunned at their friends new appearance.

((A little while later))

"Sam. Sam, wake up!", Danny's voice played in Sam's ears as she was com ming to. The last thing she remembered was that green light engulfing her. She opened her eyes to look into those of a worried Danny.

"What happened?", she asked weakly. Tucker was nowhere to be seen.

"I... I don't know", Danny said not sounding any less worried.

"What do you mean? I know something happend", she said slowly sitting up and sounding a little worried herself," Why did you scream?"

"I saw the portal was still plugged in i try-ed to warn you", Danny said.

"And then what happened to me?"

"You where thrown out of the portal by some sort of green ectoplasmic bolt and you...", he stopped speaking for a moment trying to think of how to put this.

"What? What is it Danny?", she asked trying to encourage her friend to continue.

"You... You did not look like yourself Sam", At seeing the look on her face Danny continued," You turned into a ghost of some sort. And then you turned back", he sounded like he was having a hard time believing what he was saying.

"I,m... a ghost?", she questioned numbly, looking at her hands.

"Tuck and i both saw it... And you kind of turned back and forth while you were out of it", He said looking at her in the way a doctor observed his patient.

"What did I look like?", She asked forcing curiosity to be her strongest emotion lest it all overwhelm her and she pass out again from the mental exhaustion.

Danny merely held up a hand mirror. The sight that met Sam nearly made her feint out of shock. It looked like her staring back at her through the mirror, but it also didn't. Her black hair had turned snow white, her already pale skin seemed much more so, her once violet eyes had turned a eery green color, The colors of her clothing also seemed inverted. The black of her jumpsuit turning white and vice versa she also seemed to give of some sort of glow.

She looked at Danny for a moment in silence before speaking one word.

"Wow."

What happens next.......
1421.title: The accident

"Yeah, but my parents said that ghosts can become intangible and tangible at will." Danny explained.

"Even if that is the case, it's not like I chose to fall and hit my head." Sam said a little annoyed.

"Look, all I'm saying is that maybe we should just wait here until my parents come home. They can tell us what's happening"

info.brief_description: Wat could have happend if different choices were made during Danny Phantom
info.description:
Disclamer i do not own the show or Danny Phantom.

Wat would have happend if Danny never entered the gostportal? If he had used a different strategy when first meeting plasmius? or if he dit not became a hero at all?

Its all posible in this interactive story just add but please follow the rules below.

1: Keep the people mostly in character or change them gradually don,t just turn them into OC's with the characters names.

2: OC,s and crossovers are allowed but try to keep the story focus on the Danny Phantom universe.

3: Rating may change based on content of new chapters. (example adding an 18+ chapter will cause me to raise the story rating to 18+)

But most importent have fun.
